data: Below is a list of all the available Block Trigger within Minecraft:Bedrock Edition for use with Block JSON files.

data.Name: [minecraft:on_fall_on](BlockTriggers/minecraftBlock_on_fall_on.md)
data.Description: When an actor falls and lands on the block

data.Name: [minecraft:on_interact](BlockTriggers/minecraftBlock_on_interact.md)
data.Description: When an actor interacts with a block.

data.Name: [minecraft:on_placed](BlockTriggers/minecraftBlock_on_placed.md)
data.Description: When an actor places a block in the world.

data.Name: [minecraft:on_player_destroyed](BlockTriggers/minecraftBlock_on_player_destroyed.md)
data.Description: When an actor, that is tagged as a player, destroys a block.

data.Name: [minecraft:on_player_placing](BlockTriggers/minecraftBlock_on_player_placing.md)
data.Description: When an actor, that is tagged as a player, places a block in the world.

data.Name: [minecraft:on_step_off](BlockTriggers/minecraftBlock_on_step_off.md)
data.Description: When an actor steps off the block.

data.Name: [minecraft:on_step_on](BlockTriggers/minecraftBlock_on_step_on.md)
data.Description: When an actor steps on the block.
